00039 // Called once for each event in the main event loop
00040 // Return non-zero to indicate a problem and terminate the event loop
00041 int PlotPedestalAndNoise::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00042 
00043   // Prepare a few variables
00044   std::string bankname, detname;
00045   PulseIslandList thePulseIslands;
00046   StringPulseIslandMap::const_iterator it;
00047 
00048   // Loop over each detector
00049   for(it = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.begin(); it != gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.end(); ++it){
00050     
00051     // Get the bank and detector names for this detector
00052     bankname = it->first;
00053     detname = setup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00054 
00055     // Get the TPIs
00056     thePulseIslands = it->second;
00057     if (thePulseIslands.size() == 0) continue; // no pulses here..
00058 
00059     // Create the histogram that will store all the average RMS noises from each event
00060     if (fPedestalVsNoiseHistograms.find(detname) == fPedestalVsNoiseHistograms.end()) {
00061       int n_bits = TSetupData::Instance()->GetNBits(bankname);
00062       int x_min = 0;
00063       int x_max = std::pow(2, n_bits);
00064       int n_bins_x = (x_max - x_min)/10;
00065 
00066       int y_min = 0;
00067       int y_max = 200;
00068       int n_bins_y = (y_max - y_min)*10;
00069 
00070       std::string histname = "fPedestalVsNoiseHistogram_" + detname;
00071       std::stringstream histtitle;
00072       histtitle << "Plot of the Pedestal vs Noise (mean and RMS of first " << fNSamples << " samples) in " << detname;
00073 
00074       TH2D* histogram = new TH2D(histname.c_str(), histtitle.str().c_str(), n_bins_x,x_min,x_max, n_bins_y,y_min,y_max);
00075       histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Pedestal [ADC]");
00076       histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Noise [ADC]");
00077       fPedestalVsNoiseHistograms[detname] = histogram;
00078     }
00079 
00080     TH2D* pedestal_vs_noise_histogram = fPedestalVsNoiseHistograms[detname];
00081 
00082     // Loop through all the pulses
00083     for (PulseIslandList::iterator pulseIter = thePulseIslands.begin(); pulseIter != thePulseIslands.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00084 
00085       const std::vector<int>& theSamples = (*pulseIter)->GetSamples();
00086 
00087       double sum = 0;
00088       for (int iSample = 0; iSample < fNSamples; ++iSample) {
00089         sum += theSamples.at(iSample);
00090       }
00091       double mean = sum / fNSamples;
00092       
00093       double sum_of_deviations_squared = 0;
00094       for (int iSample = 0; iSample < fNSamples; ++iSample) {
00095         sum_of_deviations_squared += (theSamples.at(iSample) - mean)*(theSamples.at(iSample) - mean);
00096       }
00097       double RMS = std::sqrt(sum_of_deviations_squared);
00098 
00099       pedestal_vs_noise_histogram->Fill(mean, RMS);
00100     } // end loop through pulses
00101   } // end loop through detectors
00102 
00103   return 0;
00104 }
00105 
00106 // Called just after the main event loop
00107 // Can be used to write things out, dump a summary etc
00108 // Return non-zero to indicate a problem
00109 int PlotPedestalAndNoise::AfterLastEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00110 
00111   // Print extra info if we're debugging this module:
00112   if(Debug()){
00113      cout<<"-----PlotPedestalAndNoise::AfterLastEntry(): I'm debugging!"<<endl;
00114   }
00115 
00116   // Print the channel, bank and mean and RMS of first fNSamples to a text file
00117   std::ofstream out_file("pedestal-and-noise.txt", std::ofstream::out);
00118   out_file << "Channel\tBank\tPedestal\tNoise" << std::endl;
00119   for (std::map<std::string, TH2D*>::iterator histIter = fPedestalVsNoiseHistograms.begin(); histIter != fPedestalVsNoiseHistograms.end(); ++histIter) {
00120     std::string detname = histIter->first;
00121     std::string bankname = setup->GetBankName(detname);
00122     TH2D* pedestal_vs_noise_histogram = histIter->second;
00123 
00124     double pedestal = pedestal_vs_noise_histogram->GetMean(1);
00125     double noise = pedestal_vs_noise_histogram->GetMean(2);
00126     out_file << detname << "\t" << bankname << "\t" << pedestal << "\t" << noise << std::endl;
00127   }
00128 
00129   return 0;
00130 }
